raw_comment:
This graph is able to show the varying mindsets of relatively young people compared to relatively older people. It shows how younger people, on average, have a more positive mindset towards the way that the world has turned out.
The style of this graph is a scatter plot. The variables are the responses of the younger people and the responses of the older people. It shows a moderate correlation between young people and more positive responses towards the world's growing conditions. 
I feel that the audience intended for this graph are sociocultural and brain development professionals. From a psychological standpoint, this audience may be able to use this information to see the differences that different cultures' cognitive processes, regarding optimism, differ with age.
I think the purpose is to show the difference in cognition between different societies and ages. As younger people seem to have a more positive mindset, there may be a developmental stage during 15-24 years old that could impact your mindset. In addition, differences in culture can play a role in the differences in mental development.
ace_sentences: This graph can show the varying mindsets of relatively young people and relatively older people.
The graph shows that younger people have a more positive mindset than older people on average.
The graph is a scatter plot.
The variables are the responses of younger people and the responses of older people.
The graph shows a moderate correlation between younger people and positive responses about the world's growing conditions.
I think that the intended audience of this graph is sociocultural professionals and brain-development professionals.
From a psychological standpoint, this audience can use this information to see differences between age groups.
Different cultures have different cognitive processes regarding optimism.
These cognitive processes can differ with age.
I think that the purpose of the graph is to show differences in cognition between societies and age groups.
Younger people seem to have a more positive mindset.
There may be a developmental stage during the age range from 15 years to 24 years that can impact a person's mindset.
Differences in culture can play a role in differences in mental development.
